channel.title: Money Pouch Errors
channel.description: Hello I am trying to code in my money pouch. I have been successful so far but, I am stuck on correcting these errors. I am adding them in the correct spot and I have tried importing the class into client.java and that just brought up another error. Can someone help me correct them? [code]src\server\model\players\Client.java:329: error: cannot find symbol private MoneyPouch moneyPouch = new MoneyPouch(this); ^ symbol: class MoneyPouch location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1498: error: cannot find symbol public MoneyPouch getMoneyPouch() { ^ symbol: class MoneyPouch location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:329: error: cannot find symbol private MoneyPouch moneyPouch = new MoneyPouch(this); ^ symbol: class MoneyPouch location: class Client[/code]

item.title: Money Pouch Errors
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Hello I am trying to code in my money pouch. I have been successful so far but, I am stuck on correcting these errors. I am adding them in the correct spot and I have tried importing the class into client.java and that just brought up another error. Can someone help me correct them?

src\server\model\players\Client.java:329: error: cannot find symbol private MoneyPouch moneyPouch = new MoneyPouch(this); ^ symbol: class MoneyPouch location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:1498: error: cannot find symbol public MoneyPouch getMoneyPouch() { ^ symbol: class MoneyPouch location: class Client src\server\model\players\Client.java:329: error: cannot find symbol private MoneyPouch moneyPouch = new MoneyPouch(this); ^ symbol: class MoneyPouch location: class Client

Read full topic
